an5.82:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.82:1.3: Avitarago hoti, avitadoso hoti, avitamoho hoti, makkhi ca, palasi ca—
an5.82:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.82:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.82:2.3: Vitarago hoti, vitadoso hoti, vitamoho hoti, amakkhi ca, apalasi ca—
an5.82:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti.
